long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Effortlessly export TripAdvisor reviews, include Hotels, Things to Do, Restaurants, Vacation Rentals, Cruises!

🔧 How it Works:
1️⃣ Open an TripAdvisor review page.
2️⃣ Click open our extension, then click the Export button.
3️⃣ Done! Sit back and just wait a moment, let our extension handle the rest.

🔥 Key Features:
1️⃣ Run in the background without waiting for finish.
2️⃣ Export on multiple product pages simultaneous.
3️⃣ Export reviews for current item to a csv file, data include: Display Name, User Name, User Profile, User Avatar, User Location, Rating, Additional Ratings, Review Title, Review Text, Helpful Votes, Photos, Stay Date, Traveler Type, Created Date, Published Date, Language, Url.

🎯 Targeted Users: business owners, data analysts, and competitor researchers alike.

💡 Benefit from our dedicated support team! We're here to assist you at every step and provide prompt, knowledgeable help.

💪 Take control of your business data management and make informed decisions with TripAdvisor Review Exporter today!

Note: This extension is an independent creation and is not affiliated with or endorsed by TripAdvisor ❗️🔒
